const response = await client.ml.evaluateDataFrame({
  index: "house_price_predictions",
  query: {
    bool: {
      filter: [
        {
          term: {
            "ml.is_training": false,
          },
        },
      ],
    },
  },
  evaluation: {
    regression: {
      actual_field: "price",
      predicted_field: "ml.price_prediction",
      metrics: {
        r_squared: {},
        mse: {},
        msle: {
          offset: 10,
        },
        huber: {
          delta: 1.5,
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
